archetype_name: Family Low-Carb Weeknight Bowls & Wraps (15–30, Mild)
name: Mild Turkey Taco Lettuce Wraps with Roasted Peppers & Onions
description: Low-carb turkey taco lettuce wraps with oven-roasted peppers and onions, mild seasoning, and fresh avocado and salsa. Easy family weeknight handhelds with bright, familiar flavors.
prep_steps: Slice onions and peppers into thin strips.
In a small bowl, mix ground cumin, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.
Separate and rinse romaine lettuce leaves; pat dry.
Halve, pit, and dice avocado; squeeze lime over the avocado to prevent browning.
Grate or shred cheddar cheese if not pre-shredded.
cook_steps: On a sheet pan, toss sliced onions and peppers with half the olive oil and half the spice mix. Spread in a single layer and roast for 12–15 minutes until tender with light browning.
While vegetables roast, heat a large skillet over medium-high heat with the remaining olive oil. Add turkey and cook, breaking it up, for 6–8 minutes until no longer pink.
Sprinkle the remaining spice mix over the turkey and stir for 1 minute to coat evenly. Reduce heat to low to keep warm.
Assemble wraps: place 2 romaine leaves per person on plates. Fill with spiced turkey, roasted peppers and onions, avocado, a spoon of salsa, and a sprinkle of cheddar cheese.
Serve immediately with extra lime wedges if desired.
